tier.item: `I saw a man that was hitting my son.'
I saw a man that was hitting my son.
(18) a. T<em>akaw Da paisu i isaw
b. tu=Takaw-aw na paisu kan isaw
c. tu=Takaw-ay=ku Da paisu kan isaw
d. ku=Takaw-anay i nanali Da paisu
I stole money for my mother.
He stuck a paper on it.
Have you burned it for me?
c. tu=ba-bulu-an na barasa kana kaLi
`He will throw the stone into the river.'
He will throw the stone into the river.
b. i. tu=tusuk-aw na Lutung kan Walegan
i. tu=tusuk-aw na Lutung kan Walegan
ii. tu=tusuk-ay Da daum nantu Tanguru kana Lutung kan
GEN:3S=pierce-uV2 OBL:ID needle NOM:P:3 head OBL:D monkey OBL
`Walegan pierced the monkey's head with a needle.'
tu=tusuk-ay Da daum nantu Tanguru kana Lutung kan
GEN:3S=pierce-uV2 OBL:ID needle NOM:P:3 head OBL:D monkey OBL
Walegan pierced the monkey's head with a needle.
(29) tu-beray-ay Da ruma kan walegan i pilay
GEN:3S=give-uV2 OBL:ID house OBL:PS Walegan NOM:PS Pilay
tu-beray-ay Da ruma kan walegan i pilay
GEN:3S=give-uV2 OBL:ID house OBL:PS Walegan NOM:PS Pilay
(30) a. i. ku=saLeTag-aw na enay i babuLu
`I poured out the water in the yard.'
i. ku=saLeTag-aw na enay i babuLu
I poured out the water in the yard.
b. i. ku=saLeTag-ay Da enay nu=Tanguru
`I poured some water on your head.'
I poured some water on your head.
`He put a wasp into the drum.'
He put a wasp into the drum.
a. tu-aisel-aw tu-walak pa-ekan da tinalek kan tina-taw
`Mother persuaded the child to eat rice.'
tu-aisel-aw tu-walak pa-ekan da tinalek kan tina-taw
Mother persuaded the child to eat rice.
b. tu-pawka-(y)aw i ukak pa-alu kana maidaN
`The old man sent Ukak to hunt.'
tu-pawka-(y)aw i ukak pa-alu kana maidaN
The old man sent Ukak to hunt.

meta.line-types: M+AC+LN L G L G T

tier.item: a. adi tu-pasisi-i i ukak kan pilay
`Pilay did not force Ukak to steal money.'
adi tu-pasisi-i i ukak kan pilay
Pilay did not force Ukak to steal money.
a. tu-rENarENa-yaw [pa- EkE a Eraw ] kan pilay i
3S.Gen-persuade-NAV Cau-drink Obl wine Obl Pilay Nom Ukak
tu-rENarENa-yaw [pa-EkE a Eraw ] kan pilay i
3S.Gen-persuade-NAV Cau-drink Obl wine Obl Pilay Nom Ukak
Pilay persuaded Ukak to drink wine.
(14) a. aDi tu=dirus-i na gung kan walegan
N$G G$N:3S=bathe-TR1/2:N$G NOM ox OBL:S Walegan
aDi tu=dirus-i na gung kan walegan
